item.title: Serverless path
item.description: Introduction Step 1. … Link example hugo releases Internal link example installing hugo Step 2. … Code block example git clone https://github.com/spf13/hugo cd hugo /path/to/where/you/installed/hugo server --source=./docs > 29 pages created > 0 tags index created > in 27 ms > Web Server is available at http://localhost:1313 > Press ctrl+c to stop Step 3. … Image example Step 4. Have fun The best way to learn something is to play with it.
